title: Sample Project 1
description: A modern web application built with React and TypeScript. This project demonstrates best practices in frontend development and includes features like authentication, data visualization, and real-time updates.

title: Sample Project 2
description: A full-stack application with a RESTful API backend and responsive frontend. Features include user management, file uploads, and comprehensive search functionality.

title: Sample Project 3
description: An open-source library for data processing and visualization. Built with performance in mind, supporting large datasets and real-time updates.
